AD_Wyll.synopsis: Wyll has a suggestion for the players.
AD_Wyll.how_to_trigger: With Wyll in the party, read every hint in the Insight Puzzle (S_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Hint1_ddc9f895-2055-4350-8552-93c705e6cca2S_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Hint5_9ee65970-df25-4eb7-995e-7b2075e07a98S_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Hint3_d697147b-159f-4329-b6e9-e31311c9dde0S_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Hint2_64082582-01ac-4f30-b873-aa4554fb7881S_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Hint4_4f997741-bdc5-472d-a346-02b5b33dabfeS_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Hint6_ed43632d-49c6-4a50-bd00-bbd6dffcfc66)

Rules.synopsis: Announces the rules of the insight puzzle - players need to destroy the right statue, based on the clues gathered around.

AD_Fail.synopsis: Announces that the player has failed the puzzle by destroying the wrong statue.

AD_Birds.synopsis: Player tries to capture a bird (flying book) and fails.
AD_Birds.how_to_trigger: Go to S_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Bird1_bc57916f-d2c6-42ee-83d7-465baf5a2746 in BGO_Main_A and click on it.

AD_Success.synopsis: The statues comment on the player's success in the insight puzzle.
AD_Success.how_to_trigger: Go to S_WYR_InsightTest_Statue1_deebcb35-d6cc-4b1c-af44-929c1382d0ba in BGO_Main_A and destroy it.

AD_Wyll_0.speaker: Wyll
AD_Wyll_0.text: The solution's plain as the High Moors in Midsummer. Let's chat.

Rules_2.text: Strike down the advisor who would lead the city to ruin.

Rules_3.text: A good leader has the insight to find good counsel.

Rules_0.text: As a war reaches its end, there is one who doesn't advise for the city's prosperity.

Rules_1.text: Find him, and strike him down.

AD_Fail_1.text: In your ignorance, you have chosen poor counsel. Unacceptable.

AD_Birds_0.speaker: Player
AD_Birds_0.context: NodeContext: Trying to catch a flying book but failing.

AD_Success_0.text: An insightful decision. The tree of peace bore lasting fruit. Proceed.
